issues.title: Multi-Threading in IndexSearcher (after removal of MultiSearcher and ParallelMultiSearcher)

Fix implementation of PositionLengthAttribute in Token.java
Cleanup & deprecate Token class / Improve default AttributeFactory to no longer use reflection
Randomize attributefactory in MockTokenizer, TestRandomChains, etc.
Need a clean way for Dir/MultiReader to "merge" the AttributeSources of the sub-readers

contrib/HighFreqTerms should use ByteRefs but provide human-readable output
make MultiPhraseQuery's UnionDocsAndPositionsEnum public
